semantics.label: Score explanation text
semantics.default: Correct answers give +1 point. Incorrect answers give -1 point. The lowest possible score is 0.

fields.label: The title of this question
fields.description: Özet ve istatistik gibi yerlerde kullanılır.

fields.label: Show Title
fields.description: Uncheck this option if you do not want this title to be displayed. The title will only be displayed in summaries, statistics etc.

fields.label: Background image
fields.description: Optional. Select an image to use as background for your drag and drop task.

fields.label: Task size
fields.description: Specify how large (in px) the play area should be.

fields.label: Task
fields.description:
Start by placing your drop zones.
Next, place your droppable elements and check off the appropriate drop zones.
Last, edit your drop zone again and check off the correct answers.
Choose the type of content you would like to add.

fields.label: Infinite number of element instances
fields.description: Clones this element so that it can be dragged to multiple drop zones.

fields.label: Message displayed on correct match
fields.description: Message will appear below the task on "check" if correct droppable is matched.

fields.label: Message displayed on incorrect match
fields.description: Message will appear below the task on "check" if the match is incorrect.

fields.label: This drop zone can only contain one element
fields.description: Make sure there is only one correct answer for this dropzone

fields.label: Enable Auto-Align
fields.description: Will auto-align all draggables dropped in this zone.

fields.label: Define custom feedback for any score range
fields.description: Click the "Add range" button to add as many ranges as you need. Example: 0-20% Bad score, 21-91% Average Score, 91-100% Great Score!

semantics.label: Davranış ayarları
semantics.description: Bu seçenekler aktivitenin çalışma şeklini denetlemenize izin verir.

fields.label: Require user input before the solution can be viewed
Bütün aktivite için bir puan verin
fields.description: Disable to give one point for each draggable that is placed correctly.

fields.label: Apply penalties
fields.description: Apply penalties for elements dropped in the wrong drop zones. This must be enabled when the same element(s) are able to be dropped into multiple drop zones, or if there is only one drop-zone. If this is not enabled, learners may match all items to all drop-zones and always receive a full score.

fields.label: Enable score explanation
fields.description: Display a score explanation to user when checking their answers (if the 'Apply penalties' option has been selected).

fields.label: Background opacity for draggables
fields.description: If this field is set, it will override opacity set on all draggable elements. This should be a number between 0 and 100, where 0 means full transparency and 100 means no transparency

fields.label: Drop Zone Highlighting
fields.description: Bırakma noktalarının ne zaman vurgulanacağını seçiniz.

fields.label: Tam ekran açık
fields.description: Check this option to enable the full screen button.

fields.label: Puanları göster
fields.description: Show points earned for each answer. Not available when the 'Give one point for the whole task' option is enabled.

semantics.label: Doğru/yanlış cevaplara ilişkin gönütlerin bulunduğu alanın başlığı
Okuyucu kullananlar için puan barının metin gösterimi
